amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director to conduct a study regarding the economic impact of the changes in current law resulting from Sections 3, 4, and 5 of the bill on the ability of individuals and small businesses owned by women, veterans, and minorities to assert, secure, and vindicate their constitutionally guaranteed exclusive right to their inventions and discoveries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
